source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: How to Draw in Perspective
items.headline: Master the Laws of Vanishing Points, Horizons, and Other Three-Dimensional Elements
objectives_summary: Draw in perspective with 1 vanishing point.
Draw in perspective with 2 vanishing points.
Draw in perspective with 3 vanishing points.

items.title: ZBrush Course - Learn Re-topology and have control in ZBrush
items.headline: ZBrush Creating clean topology is an essential skill to learn, this course is aimed at just that learn re-topology
objectives_summary: Have a full understanding of different processes of creating clean geometry for animation
Understand the principals of UV layout and exporting maps

items.title: Learn To Create 3D 360 Walk Throughs : The Quickest Way

visible_instructors.display_name: Jake Denham BA, MA, Official V-Ray Mentor
visible_instructors.title: Jake Denham BA, MA, Official V-Ray Mentor
visible_instructors.name: Jake

items.headline: Learn to create photographic 360 renders with 3ds Max, Vray and Photoshop and then publish them to any device.
objectives_summary: Create photo realistic 360 images
Publish interactive 360 images to share with anyone on any device
Master the workflow pros use day to day to make 3D renders

items.title: How to Optimize 3D Prints
items.headline: New Course That Makes It Easy for Anyone to Improve Their 3D Print Quality
objectives_summary: How to Optimize 3D Prints

items.title: ZBrush 4 R8 - Game of Thrones  John Snow Likeness Sculpt

visible_instructors.title: UK Online Training Centre
visible_instructors.name: UK Online
visible_instructors.job_title: Online training centre based in the UK creative studies

items.headline: Learn to create amazing likeness sculpt in ZBrush with my special techniques
objectives_summary: Confidently have all the tools to tackle character design
Be able to create a great likeness sculpts
Have  a better knowledge of ZBrush

items.title: After Effects for Beginners: 4 Projects to Get You Started
items.headline: Learn the Basics and Create Something fun!
objectives_summary: Create custom motion graphic transitions using shape layers and simple keyframes
Gain valuable tips and tricks that can be used for any project
Use shape layers and masks to create a simple logo reveal

items.title: Super Sila (School of motion design)
items.headline: After Effects (AE): basics of animation, motion graphics and visual effects + Element 3D, Stardust, Newton
objectives_summary: Create motion design (through actual practice)
Apply strong cinematic techniques to motion design (based on 12 basic principles of animation)
Convey authentic feeling (through style, color scheme, composition, movement)

items.title: Mastering Assets Creation with Blender&Substance painter
items.headline: English
objectives_summary: Become an expert in modeling all kind of 3d assets using blender2.8 and substance painter.
3d modeling,3d texturing

items.title: Houdini FX For Beginners
items.headline: Production Masterclass, Houdini FLIP, Pyro, Destruction, Dynamics, Rendering and Compositing
objectives_summary: You will learn how to create FX that you will actually be doing when you get your first job!
You will learn how to create explosions with Pyro
You will learn how to use FLIP Fluids to create oceans and water FX

items.title: Complete 3D Visual Art Masterclass in Cinema 4D and Octane
items.headline: Learn 3D Art - Creating scenes, Texturing, Lighting, Enhancements, Rendering, Post-processing and Art Theory.
objectives_summary: Art theory
3D Texturing
3D Lighting

items.title: Absolute Beginners Substance Painter course
items.headline: Learn the basics of Substance Painter, baking and texturing. As a bonus - rendering in Marmoset!
objectives_summary: In this course we will bake textures, create materials in Substance painter and make a render in Marmoset Toolbag

items.title: After Effects Master Class: The 3D Camera Explained
items.headline: Don't just use the 3d camera...become a Master of it.
objectives_summary: Have a full understanding of the After Effects 3D Camera
Know how to create and animate a camera
Begin utilizing Depth of Field instantly

items.title: Learn to Unwrap and Texture a Stylized Character for Games

visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!

items.headline: In this course we will learn the necessary skills to texture a 3D Game-Character in the hand-painted style!
objectives_summary: Model and texture the low poly mesh for a video game character
Regenerate clean topology from the high poly source model and UV unwrap it to prepare for textures
Learn to texture a character using the popular hand-painted game texturing style

items.title: Fusion 360 - Robot Design
items.headline: Become a product designer- Learn 2D & 3D design, analysis, drafting and rendering of the robot from scratch in Fusion360
objectives_summary: Getting familiar with fusion 360.
Completely hands on Step by step product designing procedure.
3D modeling and assembly of the robot.

items.title: Baking Normal and AO Maps for Games with 3ds Max

visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!

items.headline: Learn the pro tips and tricks to render perfect normal and AO maps in 3ds Max - faster and without errors every time!
objectives_summary: Learn to bake flawless normal maps and ambient occlusion maps
Learn tips and tricks to speed up your rendering pipeline and methods for baking high-to-low meshes

items.title: Furniture visualization course  for architects and designers

items.headline: Lear how to create, render and present your product in 3D
objectives_summary: Create extremely realistic textures and materials.
Properly model high poly models to export them into other softwares such es Mudbox, Zbrush, etc.
Unwrap properly advnaced models in 3D's Max
